root: ^A scene similar to the first landmass being saved, the prof. has  seemingly been able to repair the landmass again. The unforeseen consequences are continuing to build in the background.
^The Prof.: “Healing isn’t enough to stop an idea. You can heal as many battle scars as you can a paper cut. But the deeper the wound, the harder it is to heal.”
^Dolph: “So can you heal the concept? The source?”
^The Prof.: “With you and everyone else here. But it requires blood. Blood deeper than any wound.”
^The Prof.: “I am a healer, not one who wounds.”
^Dolph: “It's nothing. Keep at it with the other land masses.”
^The Prof.: “Just  remember I can only hold ‘The One’ back for so long.”
^Dolph: “We will get the land back, no matter what.”
^The Prof.: “The longer we delay the worse it's going to get.”
^The prof. Is dragged off screen/disappears to the left
^Same for Dolph  but to the right
^7A enters the scene alone to the right
^7A: “Everytime I see them. I can see you. Sister.”
^7A: “I see mom, I see dad. I see all of those bodies…”
^7A: “Friends and enemies alike, dropping like flies.”
^Grugg enters to the right being dragged in/appearing.
^7A: “Oh, how long have you been there?”
^7A: “Hey, would you be willing to listen to me?”
^7A: “I’m afraid. Afraid I am going to see more people die.”
^7A: “What can I even do? I wasn’t good enough to protect my family, my friends. I even had to gun some of them down.”
^7A: “What makes me so damn special? That they had to rip me away from the only people left worth protecting. The resistance won’t last long without me.”
